name: DragoRescue
description:
Your sister has been kidnapped by a group of evil knights -- storm the castle and rescue her from their clutches!

This game was made with great inspiration from NES games, and was meant to emulate them through artstyle and game feel. Though it wasn't meant to be a thorough copy, I'm happy with how it turned out!

Note: game has no audio

Note 2: if the game doesn't work in your browser, try opening it in another browser

Controls:

Left/Right arrow keys - Move left/right

Up arrow key - Jump / Flap

Down arrow key - Crouch

Space Bar - Fire

Programs used:

- Firealpaca / Paint.NET / Clip Studio Paint (Graphics)

- Godot (game engine)

I'd like to thank everyone who's given advice and playtested this game (even through their frustrations).
